articles.title: Absa CEO Daniel Mminele leaves over strategy dispute after 15 months, acting CEO appointed - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Absa CEO Daniel Mminele has stepped down, the bank said on Tuesday, a shock departure just 15 months into his post that sent shares in one of Africa's biggest lenders down as much as 5%.
